item.title: Germanyâ€™s auto giants were already reeling. Now Trump wants to turn them into American companies
item.description: For Germany, the prospect of U.S. tariffs on European autos comes at a time when it's top original equipment manufacturers are already reeling.

item.title: Salesforce will hire 2,000 people to sell AI products, CEO Marc Benioff says
item.description: Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff said his company is bringing on more salespeople specializing in artificial intelligence.

item.title: Trump attorney alleges 'grave juror misconduct' in hush money trial, calls to toss verdicts
item.description: The letter from Donald Trump defense attorneys Todd Blanche and Emil Bove alleging juror misconduct in the criminal hush money trial is heavily redact...

item.title: Luigi Mangione indicted on murder charges for shooting of UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson
item.description: Luigi Mangione is accused of shooting UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson. Shell casings and a bullet carried the words "deny," "delay" and "depose."

item.title: The Fed has a big interest rate decision coming Wednesday. Here's what to expect
item.description: Traders are pricing in a near certainty that the Fed on Wednesday will lower its key rate by a quarter percentage point.
